tableSections.name: Name:
table: {{utility-names-fantasy/elven/male-middle:Aerandir}} {{utility-names-fantasy/elven/surname-gen:Aeramiel}}

He is {{utility-npc/physical/height:tall}}, {{utility-npc/physical/build:stocky}} with {{utility-senses/body/eyes-all}} eyes, {{utility-npc/physical/facial-features:a crooked nose}} and {{utility-npc/physical/hair-type:wavy}} blonde hair, his facial expression is {{utility-npc/physical/demeanor:strong in character}}

He is {{utility-npc/personality/strengths:agreeable}}, {{utility-npc/personality/aspects:aloof}} and {{utility-npc/personality/faults:critical}}, has a job as a {{utility-npc-fantasy/roles/job-artisan:lensmaker}}, and spends his free time on {{utility-npc/hobby/all:painting}}

He is {{utility-npc/personality/strengths:agreeable}}, {{utility-npc/personality/aspects:aloof}} and {{utility-npc/personality/faults:critical}}, has a job as a {{utility-npc-fantasy/roles/job-artisan:gardener}}, and spends his free time on {{utility-npc-fantasy/hobby/all:gemcutting}}
He is motivated by {{utility-npc/motivation/motivation:fame}} and hides {{utility-npc/motivation/secret:an alchohol addiction}}
Has {{utility-npc/family/full:two sisters and a brother}}

Grew up {{utility-npc-fantasy/history/youth-elven-mix:in a mountain outpost}}, was for a while {{utility-npc-fantasy/roles/roles:vagabond}}, and during their younger years {{utility-npc-fantasy/history/events:was injured in battle}}
